body_html: thanks @vrv pointing my mistake, i'll rewrite the code to add new macros such as REGISTER_SYCL, and REGISTER6_SYCL. In the new code, the change could be separated to be one patch for one op, it could make each patch simple and easy to be reviewed. So, my plan is to close this PR, and send out new PRs one by one (send out the second patch only after the first one is accepted).
